article_title: Are you unemployed or underemployed and looking for health insurance?
article_text:
New portions of the Affordable Care Act are slated to take effect in October and January and aim to insure people who are unemployed and underemployed.

The News-Herald is gathering stories from people in Lake, Geauga and eastern Cuyahoga counties who are either unemployed or employed part-time, and are considering health coverage from the marketplace that opens in October or Medicaid expansion expected in January.

If youre interested in sharing your story, contact reporter Simon Husted at 440-954-7220. You can also email him at SHusted@News-Herald.com, but make certain to leave a phone number in case follow-up information is needed.



Advertisement

New portions of the Affordable Care Act are slated to take effect in October and January and aim to insure people who are unemployed and underemployed.
If youre interested in sharing your story, contact reporter Simon Husted at 440-954-7220.
